page.title: 04Leisure
page.content: People use their leisure time in lots of different ways. Some people play football, others play tennis, golf and snooker, which has become very popular because it has been shown a lot on T.V. Other popular leisure time activities are: Gymnastics, Show-Jumping, Riding BMX bikes, swimming and going to the cinema or theatre. People who enjoy going to the cinema or theatre usually have to go to Bath, Bristol or Frome, because there is no permanent cinema or theatre in Trowbridge. Many children belong to clubs such as Cubs, Brownies, Scouts or Guides.
